_comment: Created by ianb on 01/10/2014 11:47:44 using v2.1
title: Have the perceptions of the quality of care for community mental health services changed?
analysis_commentary: These data have been taken from annual surveys. There was a question change in 2008 making it difficult to compare scores with previous years; please see the data notes below for more details. Despite the lack of comparability with the data, the proportion of people feeling that their care was poor or very poor seems to have been consistently around 9% for all years. From 2013 the question was changed again (see below).
data_source: Care Quality Commission, Community Mental Health Survey
